titleStmt.title: A true and perfecte discourse of the ouerthrow of certaine companies of Burgonions both horse & foot men at Villefranche a towne scituate on the borders of Champaigne, vpon the riuer of Meuze, betweene Sunday at night & Munday morning being the 4. day of August 1597. together with the certaine number of how many are slaine and taken prisoners. Translated out of French into English, by W.P.
titleStmt.author: Phillip, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Allde for Cuthbert Burbie, and are to be solde at his shop vnder the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The ouerthrow at Villefranche.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop vnder the Royall Exchange
